cgcloud__Payment__c.name: cgcloud__Payment__c
cgcloud__Payment__c.description: This object stores the value that retailers expect as compensation for running promotions, which are executed by using tactics.

LastActivityDate.description: Most recent date on which a user performed an action on the record

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

RecordTypeId.description: Represents the record type of the record.

cgcloud__Addendum_Reference__c.description: Reference to the previous deduction addendum, if applicable.

cgcloud__Adjustment_Reference__c.description: Reference to the adjusted payment or deduction on the original payment.

cgcloud__Balance__c.description: Balance of the remaining payment amount.

cgcloud__Currency__c.description: Currency that the sales org of the payment template determines.

cgcloud__Date_From_Reference_Date__c.description: Used for the Link Tactics feature: linkable tactics must overlap with the time range [payment.reference_date__c - Date_From_Offset__c:payment.reference_Date__c + Date_Thru_Offset__c] (calculated helper value defining ther start of the time range).

cgcloud__Date_Thru_Reference_Date__c.description: Used for the Link Tactics feature: linkable tactics must overlap with the time range [payment.reference_date__c - Date_From_Offset__c:payment.reference_Date__c + Date_Thru_Offset__c] (calculated helper value defining the end of the time range).

cgcloud__ERP_Status_Date__c.description: Date on which the payment was received.

cgcloud__ERP_Status__c.description: Reference ID of the received payment.

cgcloud__Family_Status__c.description: Status that defines whether the payment has an associated parent payment.

cgcloud__KPI_Set__c.description: KPI set that's assigned to the payment template.

cgcloud__KPIs_Outdated__c.description: Checks whether the version of the Salesforce org and the corresponding version for Off-Platform are in sync.

cgcloud__Linked_Tactics_Count__c.description: Count of the Payment Tactic records.

cgcloud__Offset_Summary__c.description: Summary of the Payment Tactic records.

cgcloud__Parent_Payment__c.description: Reference to the Parent Payment of the record.

cgcloud__Payment_Age__c.description: Age of the payment: Number of days that have passed since the payment request was created.

cgcloud__Payment_Anchor_Number__c.description: Customer number of the Payment Anchor, which is populated based on the selected payment anchor.

cgcloud__Payment_Anchor__c.description: Defines the anchor customer of the payment.

cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Fund_Summary__c.description: Summary of the Payment Tactic Funds.

cgcloud__Planning_Anchor_Number__c.description: Customer number of the Planning Anchor, which is populated based on the selected planning anchor.

cgcloud__Pre_Adjustment_Amount__c.description: Amount of deduction prior to the adjustment and creation of the deduction addendum.

cgcloud__Rejected_Reason_Codes__c.description: Reasons for the rejected amount of the payment.

cgcloud__Total_Tactic_Payout_Amount__c.description: Sum of the Payment Tactic records.

cgcloud__Vendor_Anchor_Number__c.description: Customer number of the vendor anchor, which is populated based on the selected vendor anchor.
